title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E Humphrey D. Geiseb

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E Humphrey D. Geiseb, High Commissioner of the Republic of Namibia to Nigeria today, 24th May, 2024.
Discussed Bilateral matters including the 5th Session of the Namibia – Nigeria Joint Commission scheduled to hold on 6th August, 2024. Focus will be on strengthening collaboration in the areas of education, trade, wild life & tourism management, security, political consultations, as well as exemption from visa requirements for Diplomats and Government Officials.
